title: A rather deceptive font
content:
I've posted this a few times with no exact match found yet so I was hoping to give it another go again in hopes that someone recognizes it. Thanks in advance! :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008161548/http:/typophile.com/files/image_194.jpg) | 16.52 KB |
author: thecryptvinyl

comments.content: I compared the e and r repeats and it is a font - they are the same size if degraded in appearance. Beyond the fact it looks sort of familiar - I could not come up with a match or even close
Thanks for trying. Yes this one is tricky and hopefully someone finds it familiar

I do believe you have plumbed the depths of knowledge of the regulars at Typophile.  
All I can suggest at this stage is that you try some game oriented forums.  
Don
Would you happen to know any other type oriented forums like this one? I have to believe that someone out there has seen this font before. It was used in The mid 90's on this particular project.
Have you looked at all of the Calligraphic fonts listed on Dafont or AbstractFonts.
I have in fact and unfortunately no luck

Reminds me of the rustic capitals ( and the work of Klaus-Peter Schäffel: [http://www.kps-fonts.ch/en\_gruppe3.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008161548/http:/www.kps-fonts.ch/en_gruppe3.html "http://www.kps-fonts.ch/en\_gruppe3.html") [http://www.kps-fonts.ch/en\_gruppe4.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008161548/http:/www.kps-fonts.ch/en_gruppe4.html "http://www.kps-fonts.ch/en\_gruppe4.html") )  
Anyway, other font identification forums:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008161548/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/ "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/")  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/all-posts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008161548/http:/www.whatfontis.com/all-posts.html "http://www.whatfontis.com/all-posts.html")  
 [http://www.dafont.com/forum/?f=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008161548/http:/www.dafont.com/forum/?f=1 "http://www.dafont.com/forum/?f=1")
I will try those forums as well. Thank you!
